desc: 5% decrease in damage received from Dark types

dictionary.lore: Many pieces of equipment were made with the power of dark magic in the Bariura Empire, where research into dark magic was incredibly popular. This piece of equipment is one of them, wrapping its wearer in shadows to reduce damage taken from dark attacks. It is thought that this is a highly useful piece of equipment in the Bariura Empire, where battles with dark magic wielders is commonplace.

name: Dark Mail
